attributes.action: examine litter collection and park benches in Warrington - legislate so govt funding is equitably distributed, coming to some agreement in respect of park benches : per population or per distance or per income ratios
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My mum had a knee replacement recently, and whilst rehabiliating, it became clear how my local area has very few benches - please advise on funding this - what should I do to get a bench put along Fearnhead Lane to rest half way between the shops and my house ?
Also a litter bin might be a good idea.
Please PM. show that you care about my Mum and our local area.
